channel.title: Please help me with 2 things im really sad =((((
channel.description: Ok, im really frustirated and sad about this... 1.How can i change the music on moparscape v3.2 to real runescape music =\ 2.how can i make it so that i can use like dragon gloves iron gloves slayer gloves and those other gloves that fall into that category, work on project 16 v3?

item.title: Please help me with 2 things im really sad =((((
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

ok here is some solutions for the first. either record your own music by playing runescape and actually recording every single one then put them in the music folder for runescape or download it off some website which i dont know of.

for the second problem what do you mean by get the gloves working? like get them in the right slot or what?

Read full topic
